Rancor:
     Rancor scuttled up and into the base, his first visit, and followed Cygnar into the office.
Cryotek:
     "I believe I already told you my name," He said, "It is Cryotek. And I was here to destroy Megatron, but you say that he is fused into this 'Hydras.' This does not bode well.
     "As for who I am, well, I am the one who stole the Golden Disk for Megatron, I taught him all he knew. And he betrayed me, putting me in a stasis lock. But no matter. If his Spark remains I will destroy it."
 
 Rudra656@... wrote:::Cygnar:: 
      He glances over at Cryotek suppressing any signs of his surprise that there was someone there.  "Hello, and you are going to be disappointed there is no more Megatron, or Galvatron for that matter.  The have fused into Hydras.  Which reminds me, who are you and why are you here?"
